post.summary: Register a new device with the fleet
Send periodic heartbeat and receive pending actions

get.summary: Get logs for a specific device in the fleet

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

publicv1SystemInfo.title: SystemInfo contains comprehensive system information about a device

v1Application.title: Application represents a complete application definition

v1Artifact.title: Artifact represents a deployable software package

v1ArtifactType.description:
- ARTIFACT_TYPE_BINARY: Standalone executable
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_OCI_IMAGE: Docker/Podman container
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_ARCHIVE: tar.gz, zip
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_PACKAGE: deb, rpm, apk
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_NIXPACK: Nix package
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_SCRIPT: Shell/Python script
v1ArtifactType.title: Artifact types

v1ClusterNode.title: ClusterNode represents a node in the cluster

v1Deployment.title: Deployment represents a software rollout to devices

configured.title: Whether device is registered with fleet server

v1Fleet.title: Fleet represents a group of devices

metricsEndpoint.title: Server endpoints for different data types

v1K3sRole.description:
- K3S_ROLE_SERVER: Control plane node
 - K3S_ROLE_AGENT: Worker node
 - K3S_ROLE_SERVER_INIT: First server (with --cluster-init)
v1K3sRole.title: K3sRole defines the role in a k3s cluster

v1NodeStatus.title: NodeStatus represents the status of a cluster node

configUpdate.title: Server can send back updated config

deviceTags.title: Devices with these tags belong to this team

v1Team.title: Team for organizing devices and access
